body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.14-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Y **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** N/A **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** applausetester+ck915252@applause.expensifail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team ** ## Action Performed: Precondtion: Workspace connected to verified Regions BA 1. Navigate to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Navigate to workspace overview 3. Observe the following message is displayed "The default currency can't be changed because this workspace is linked to a USD bank account" & user cannot the default currency 4. Go to Workflows page 5. Toggle off & on the Make & track payments option 6. Go back to workspace overview 7. Observe user has option to change default currency now with a message saying "All expenses on this workspace will be converted to this currency." 8. Click the currency option 9. Observe Not here page opens ## Expected Result: On step 7 - After disabling & enable make & track payments, user should not have an option to change workspace default currency in overview page Default currency option should not be clickable & still displays the same message as in step 3 "The default currency can't be changed because this workspace is linked to a USD bank account" ## Actual Result: After disabling & enable make & track payments in workflows page, User has on option to change workspace defaullt currency which opens Not here page ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.14-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-799/folder/13176730/41237113/896383465 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** jdsionjsosjodi@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Mac 15.5 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Precondition: - Admin invites member to the workspace chat. 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. [Member] Go to workspace chat. 3. [Member] Create an expense. 4. [Member] Go to expense report. 5. [Member] Click Report field > Remove from report. 6. [Admin] Go to workspace chat (workspace chat with yourself). 7. [Admin] Click + > Create report. 8. [Admin] On report preview, click Add expense > Add unreported expense. ## Expected Result: The unreported expense from member in Step 5 will not appear in unreported expense list for admin. ## Actual Result: The unreported expense from member in Step 5 appears in unreported expense list for admin. The expense cannot be added to the report. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3de59760-c6f3-4c26-b216-3fb096c5a43e [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

body:
If you havenâ€™t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.14-4 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-802/folder/13176670/41237100/896386324 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** ibellicotest+1803@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Motorola MotoG60 / Android 12 / Chrome ( mWeb / Hybrid app) - Windows 11 / Chrome **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Prerequisite: Have two accounts opened on two different devices or environments. Prerequisite 2: User B has at least one workspace available. 1. Open the Expensify app. 2. Tap on FAB and select "Create Expense" 3. Create a manual expense and submit it to User B. 4. As User B, open the just received expense. 5. Tap on "More" and select "Change Workspace" 6. Select any workspace to move the expense to. 7. Leave "Merchant" and "Category" fields empty. 8. As User A, open workspace chat. 9. Long tap on expense preview and delete it. (On Web, open expense report first) 10. Return to "Inbox" 11. Note that RBR is still displayed on "Inbox" on navigation bar. ## Expected Result: When receiver moves an IOU to a workspace without adding merchant and category, and sender deletes it, RBR should automatically disappear from workspace chat and from "Inbox" on navigation bar. ## Actual Result: When receiver moves an IOU to a workspace without adding merchant and category, and sender deletes it, RBR is still visible on "Inbox" on navigation bar on senderÂ´s side. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/130d308d-93b7-425f-9cb4-9ae6d258f706 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
